alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 22 at 1:57PM AKST until January 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches, with localized amounts up to 9 inches, are possible. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through late Monday night. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will cause widespread blowing and drifting snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
